page.title: 03THE VILLAGE OF HARVINGTON
page.content: Harvington is a village.It is a medium sized village which is near EVESHAM. Evesham is the nearest town and it is about 4 miles away .In Harvington there are many different types of houses.They are mainly detached, semi-detached and terraced. Some are very new others as much as 400 years old. There is one church in Harvington called St.James and a Baptist chapel which is also used for a Brownie Pack which meets on a Wednesday. There is one Village Hall which is used by many organisations such as Playgroup, Drama group, Mothers and Toddlers etc. There is one school in Harvington which has about 80 children and four teachers. There is a Post Office in Harvington and one General Store. The General Store has a Freezer Centre. Most people in Harvington do not do their weekly shopping in the village.
